DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to study the effect of zinc supplementation in end stage renal failure on hemocystein level.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Zinc Suplementation on Serum Hemosystein Level in Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: hemocystein increased in end stage renal failure and zinc involved in hemocystein metabolism thus zinc supplementation may be effective on hemocystein level.
DOC.criteria: hemodialysis for 3 months older than 18 years old serum level of zinc less than 72.6 microgram/ l in men and less than 70 microgram/ l in female acute renal failre malabsorption history of steroid or cytotoxic consumption
